LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTossedUp.label: 飞高高
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTossedUp.stages.0.label: 飞高高
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTossedUp.stages.0.descrip: 有人把我抛到高高的地方！咿呀！
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTickled.label: 被挠痒痒
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTickled.stages.0.label: 被挠痒痒
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerTickled.stages.0.descript: 有人挠我痒痒，笑个不停！
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerSpunAround.label: 转圈
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerSpunAround.stages.0.label: 转圈
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerSpunAround.stages.0.descr: 有人抱着我转圈圈，世界在转！
LanguageData.RimTalk_PlayedWithToddler.label: 和幼儿玩耍
LanguageData.RimTalk_PlayedWithToddler.stages.0.label: 和幼儿玩耍
LanguageData.RimTalk_PlayedWithToddler.stages.0.descr: 和小家伙一起玩耍，心里暖暖的。
